frontMatter.title: 微软正式推出 Windows 包管理工具
frontMatter.summary: 微软正式推出 Windows 包管理工具： Windows Package Manager。

prev.title: The Windows Subsystem for Linux BUILD 2020 Summary
prev.summary: This year at an all virtual BUILD conference we had many exciting announcements for the Windows Subsystem for Linux (WSL)! This blog post gives you a summary of all the WSL news, including what’s available now and what you can expect in the future.
